sources.title: The Flemish Farm
sources.description: “Poignantly conveys the pain of war” “Tidy drama” “Flag waver”(IMDB reviews quotes). Story of a one-man commando raid to recover a precious flag. Supposedly based on real events. Good cast and production. IMDB rating 5.8. Directed by Jeffrey Dell. Released in 1943 (UK only). Complete print (PAL transfer).

metadata.Plot: Wartime commando story based on fact. Allied airman risks return (on the ground) to occupied Belgium for the honour of his regiment.
metadata.Actors: Clive Brook, Clifford Evans, Jane Baxter
